```{r readFiles}
library(flowUtils)
library(flowCore)
library("flowViz")


setwd("~/__Data/")
fcsFile <- read.FCS("190717_Allen_WB_Validation1_Day0_CytoChexRT_Subj1_01_1.fcs")
# Use 'read.flowSet()' for a set of files. Accessor: [[.]] and $

exprs(fcsFile) # has the expression matrix

pData(parameters(fcsFile)) 
# column 'name' has the colnames of 'exprs'.
# column 'desc' has marker IDs.
```
